data.message: I just don't like the new messenger.

replies.message: We're sorry to hear that, Sherilynn. If there's anything we can do to make your Messenger experience more enjoyable, please let us know: http://on.fb.me/1rZQsTc.  -Elissa
To, make, it more, enjoyable would be, fix, back way, it was,   What you post, lot of people can, also have access, to your info,  should ,be confidential,!!   Just saying!!
@connie - Has anyone really been far as decided to use even go want to do look more like???
I don't have a problem with fb messenger! It's awesome! It's like texting somebody
How you do that Maria?
I'm with Sherilynn,Don't like it either!
I'm w/you guy's I don't like it either.

Maria isnt avoiding the intrusive FB Messenger permissions by using the FB App. The Facebook App has the SAME INTRUSIVE PERMISSIONS as the Messenger App...most people just arent smart enough to figure that out.
Dont like you either!
Dumb people that don't understand apps and just listen to the hysteria.
The sky is falling!
The ones who didn't listen to that r the ones who got hit on the head!! Take nothing for granted even if you "think" you know what's going on!!
I liked it until they changed it. Now it can record you. Spy on you. The government does enough of that.
i real do like  face book  i remember when i sign up on face book  i found whole lot of my family on face book .
Messenger has the same permissions as facebook app, and probably every other app on your phone. Idiots...
I quit playing games which was a good relaxer, but I refuse to fill out another app every time I play,plus giving out more info to be hacked!
If they listen or spy on me they are wasting their time. My life sure is boring.
No it makes it difficult to chat with friends
Do no understand why messenger is interupting the conversation soo often?
It burns when I pee!
Some of you guys are really mean!
Yess! Many of my friends/family have deleted fb app and fb messenger and their mobile devices are working much better! No more glitches, freezing, powering off unwantedly... Coincidence or nah?
Zeeshan KhAn Osama Tariq wants to tell u something about friendship :D
Suraj Thakur O.o
Aditya panga na le nahi to udh jayegi id apni :D Tughe mera comment kaise dikha :O :v
